mapper.insert: insert into doll_users (user_id, email, `password`, sex, birthday, user_money, frozen_money, distribut_money, pay_points, address_id, reg_time, last_login, last_ip, qq, mobile, mobile_validated, oauth, openid, head_pic, province, city, district, email_validated, nickname, `level`, discount, total_amount, is_lock, is_distribut, first_leader, second_leader, third_leader, token ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, #{birthday,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{frozenMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{distributMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastLogin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileValidated,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{oauth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{district,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{emailValidated,jdbcType=BIT}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=BIT}, #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isLock,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isDistribut,jdbcType=BIT}, #{firstLeader,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secondLeader,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{thirdLeader,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update doll_users set email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_money = #{userMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, frozen_money = #{frozenMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, distribut_money = #{distributMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_points = #{payPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reg_time = #{regTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_login = #{lastLogin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_ip = #{lastIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_validated = #{mobileValidated,jdbcType=TINYINT}, oauth = #{oauth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_pic = #{headPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, district = #{district,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email_validated = #{emailValidated,jdbcType=BIT}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=BIT}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_lock = #{isLock,jdbcType=BIT}, is_distribut = #{isDistribut,jdbcType=BIT}, first_leader = #{firstLeader,jdbcType=INTEGER}, second_leader = #{secondLeader,jdbcType=INTEGER}, third_leader = #{thirdLeader,jdbcType=INTEGER}, token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select user_id, email, `password`, sex, birthday, user_money, frozen_money, distribut_money, pay_points, address_id, reg_time, last_login, last_ip, qq, mobile, mobile_validated, oauth, openid, head_pic, province, city, district, email_validated, nickname, `level`, discount, total_amount, is_lock, is_distribut, first_leader, second_leader, third_leader, token from doll_users

select user_id, email, `password`, sex, birthday, user_money, frozen_money, distribut_money, pay_points, address_id, reg_time, last_login, last_ip, qq, mobile, mobile_validated, oauth, openid, head_pic, province, city, district, email_validated, nickname, `level`, discount, total_amount, is_lock, is_distribut, first_leader, second_leader, third_leader, token from doll_users where mobile = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR email= #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
